sentences.en: He got out his map of Yorkshire and hunched over it to read the small print.
sentences.cn: 他拿出约克郡地图，弓身趴在上面努力看清那些细小的字体。

sentences.en: He has continued to write with a bluff, vivid humour about Yorkshire life.
sentences.cn: 他继续用一种直白而又诙谐生动的笔触描绘着约克郡的生活。

sentences.en: He was brought up in North Yorkshire.
sentences.cn: 他是在北约克郡长大的。

sentences.en: He was yesterday given bail by South Yorkshire magistrates.
sentences.cn: 昨天南约克郡法院准予他获得保释。

sentences.en: I must congratulate you on your Yorkshire puddings.
sentences.cn: 我一定要祝贺你做的这道约克郡布丁.

sentences.en: In the County of Yorkshire in the north part of England there lived a baron.
sentences.cn: 在英格兰北部的约克郡,住着一位男爵.

sentences.en: Let me hear the most refined of Cockneys presume to find fault with Yorkshire manners!
sentences.cn: 我倒要听听那些顶高尚的伦敦人怎样找约克郡人在礼貌上的岔子.

sentences.en: South Yorkshire Police and the Health and Safety Executive are investigating.
sentences.cn: 南约克郡警署和健康与安全执行部正在调查此事.

sentences.en: The hills that separate Lancashire from Yorkshire are called the Pennines.
sentences.cn: 把兰开夏郡与约克夏郡分开的山脉叫宾南山脉.

sentences.en: The theatre management kindly let me off a couple of performances to go to Yorkshire.
sentences.cn: 剧院领导很体谅地同意我休演几场抽身到约克郡去。

sentences.en: We have Sandy a Yorkshire Terrier, and a German Shepherd named Sam.
sentences.cn: 我们有一只叫桑迪的约克郡犬, 还有一只德国牧羊犬,叫萨姆.

sentences.en: We saw a documentary about Yorkshire coal miners.
sentences.cn: 我们看了一部有关约克郡煤矿工人的纪录片.

sentences.en: Whether or not your Yorkshire puddings rise is the true test of your cooking ability.
sentences.cn: 不管怎样，约克郡布丁是真正考验烹饪技能的一道点心。

sentences.en: WL: I think, Yorkshire and the New Forest.
sentences.cn: 我想，是约克郡和新森林地区。

sentences.en: Yorkshire is still very much a farming community with good meat, good dairy produce and eggs.
sentences.cn: 约克郡在很大程度上仍以农业为主，出产优质肉类、奶制品和蛋类。

sentences.en: Yorkshire puddings are an accompaniment to Sunday roasts; some would say the best part of the meal.
sentences.cn: 约克郡布丁是周日烤肉的必备；有些人会说这是膳食中最好的一部分。

sentences.en: You think Yorkshire is the best cricket side ? My foot!
sentences.cn: 你以为约克郡队是最好的队 吗 ?算了吧!

sentences.en: You think Yorkshire is the best cricket side foot!
sentences.cn: 你以为约克郡队是最好的队吗?算了吧.

phrases.tran_cn: 北约克郡（英国一个地区）
南约克郡（英国苏格兰北部一个郡）
西约克郡（位于英国英格兰北部）

trans.tran_cn: 约克郡，约克夏（英国英格兰原郡名）
